Don't miss Julia Stewart Lowndes and I talk about Quarto at rstudio::conf(2022) at 9am ET. Join us in Potomac A or on the live stream at [rstd.io/conf](https://rstd.io/conf).

Our talks is titled **Hello Quarto: Share + Collaborate + Teach + Reimagine**. And our slides are at [mine.quarto.pub/hello-quarto](https://mine.quarto.pub/hello-quarto) if you'd like to follow along!

## Learn more

-   Repo for slides: [github.com/mine-cetinkaya-rundel/hello-quarto](https://github.com/mine-cetinkaya-rundel/hello-quarto)
-   Repo for the demo website we create in the talk: [github.com/mine-cetinkaya-rundel/hello-quarto-demo](https://github.com/mine-cetinkaya-rundel/hello-quarto-demo)
-   Conference schedule for more Quarto talks on Day 2 of the conference: [rstudio.com/conference/2022/schedule](https://www.rstudio.com/conference/2022/schedule/)
